_header: Mary is a lady bright / She hath a son of much might
_description: Carol on the Virgin — five quatrains (aaab) with Latin caudae and burden: A a a a / Nu[nc] gaudet maria

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Mary is a lady bryghtSche haght a sone of meche
                    myght…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…God graunt vs alle good endyngeRegnat dei
                    gracias
